body:
The advantage of this change is a better inheritance implication between derived classes and the base class `Sampler`: 
- usage of `super`
- less of code in derived classes: method `__len__` is factorized

IMO, `data_source` as init argument of sampler classes is intuitive but a little bit overkill as only `len(data_source)` is really needed and used.
